headline: International Law Enforcement & Security Expert
summary: Professional Experience and Specialties: Senior expert and advisor, Counter-Terrorism, Counter Narcotics, National Security Programs, Sensitive and highly complex negotiations, Dignitary Protection, Bomb Blast Mitigation Technology, Ballistic and Forced Entry Applications, Criminal and Terrorist Threat Assessments, Physical Security Programs, Security Protection Plans for Sea, Air, and Land based facilities, Technical oversight and direction for contract security services, Force Protection, and Overt/Covert Law Enforcement Operations.
